mapper.insert: insert into product_table (seller_id, category_id, brand, title, image,storedFileName, price, discount_rate, delivery_fee, special_price, product_detail) value (#{seller_id},#{category_id},#{brand},#{title},#{image},#{storedFileName},#{price},#{discount_rate},#{delivery_fee},#{special_price},#{product_detail})
mapper.select: select * from product_table where ${searchType} like concat('%', #{searchBox}, '%') order by product_id desc limit #{page}, #{perPageNum}
select count(product_id) from product_table where ${searchType} like concat('%', #{searchBox}, '%')
select * from product_table where ${type} like concat('%', #{q}, '%') order by product_id desc limit #{start}, #{limit}
select count(product_id) from product_table where ${type} like concat('%', #{q}, '%')
